description: This file defines a Conversation class representing a chat conversation preview, along with a list of mock conversation instances for testing or sample data purposes.

classes.name: Conversation
classes.description: An immutable class representing a chat conversation preview, including id, name, avatar URL, last message, timestamp, and unread message count.

methods.name: Conversation (constructor)
methods.description: Constructor for the Conversation class; initializes all required fields and optional unread count.
